desc: A topaz stone tethered to capricious fortune.
lore:
A topaz stone tethered to capricious fortune.

They say one man's trash is another man's treasure, but no one would dispute the allure of glimmering gold, trinkets, and baubles. Especially when it's hanging enticingly out of the edge of a suspiciously clean treasure chest, right next to piles of bones.
name: Fortune Stone
